content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function defined by <math alttext="f of x, equals, 3 times x cubed, minus 36 x, plus 6 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>36</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="negative 4 less than x, less than 4 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo><</mo><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following statements is true?

choices.label: <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0 comma 4, close parenthesis " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0 comma 4, close parenthesis " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is increasing on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0 comma 4, close parenthesis " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, 0 comma 4, close parenthesis " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 2 comma 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f double prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>″</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 2 comma 0, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 2 comma 2, close parenthesis " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 2 comma 2, close parenthesis " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is decreasing on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 2 comma 2, close parenthesis " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> because <math alttext="f prime of x, is less than 0 " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> on the interval <math alttext="open parenthesis, negative 2 comma 2, close parenthesis " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Describe the relationships among different representations of functions and their derivatives.
